name: Dandara: Trials of Fear Edition
description:
This option will install GOG edition of "Dandara: Trials of Fear Edition", specifically the Linux native version. 

*Important Notes*
During the installation process you must provide the offline install files from your own GOG.com account library. (https://www.gog.com/account)

If you do not own the game yet you can buy it here:
https://www.gog.com/game/dandara_trials_of_fear_edition

files.goginstaller: N/A:Offline installation files required! Please download and select the GOG.com Linux installer from your account library.

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Offline installation files required! Please download and select
    the GOG.com Linux installer from your account library.
game:
  exe: start.sh
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/GOG
    file: goginstaller
    format: zip
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/GOG/data/noarch/
